name: Mad Monkey Coogee Beach
description:
Welcome to Mad Monkey Coogee Beach – Our First Hostel in Australia!
Get ready to wake up to ocean views and step straight onto the sand at Mad Monkey Coogee Beach, your ultimate beachside hostel in Sydney. Just seconds from the surf and surrounded by vibrant bars, cafés, and restaurants, our hostel offers the perfect mix of chill beach vibes and social energy.

We’re known for our fun, friendly atmosphere—something you’ll feel the moment you arrive. Whether you're after a cozy dorm or an apartment-style room with a private living area, we've got you covered with clean, comfortable, and recently refurbished accommodations. Our super friendly staff are here to help with anything you need, big or small, making your stay as smooth as the Coogee waves.

Come for the beach. Stay for the Mad Monkey experience.

Location
Mad Monkey Coogee Beach puts you right on the sand at one end of the iconic Coogee to Bondi coastal walk—a must-do when visiting Sydney. Stay in the laid-back beachside suburb of Coogee, where you can relax like a local while still being close to the action.

Getting around is easy—regular buses stop right outside the hostel and run day and night into central Sydney. From Central Station, you’ll have quick access to the rest of the city and greater New South Wales. We're also just a short stroll from the Coogee Beach Cricket Oval, minutes from Royal Randwick Racecourse (Sydney’s home of horse racing), and conveniently close to the UNSW Randwick campus.

Activities & Events
At Mad Monkey, we’re all about community and good vibes. We host weekly social events to bring guests together, with favourites like pancake nights, pool tournaments, beach games, and sports days. All in-house guests will get the lowdown on what’s happening during your stay—so don’t miss out!

Accommodation
Whether you're flying solo or travelling with friends, we’ve got a space for you. Choose from classic shared dorms or more private, apartment-style rooms with your own lounge area. All rooms have been recently refurbished to ensure a clean, comfortable, and affordable stay.

Expect that signature Mad Monkey social buzz, plus our friendly team who are always on hand to help with whatever you need.

Terms & Conditions
Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours before your scheduled check-in to avoid charges.

Group bookings (4 or more guests) must be arranged in advance—please email us directly to inquire.

If you do not show up on your check-in date, your booking will be cancelled and a no-show fee will apply.

All guests must be 18 years or older. Guests over 40 are welcome but must book a private room.

For stays during the Christmas and New Year period, pre-payment is required 30 days prior to arrival and is non-refundable.

Things to Note
Reception hours: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM, 7 days a week. Arriving outside these times? Please email us in advance to arrange check-in.

Check-out time: 10:00 AM sharp.

Quiet hours: Begin at 10:00 PM to ensure a good night’s rest for all guests.

A $50 security deposit per person and valid government-issued photo ID are required at check-in.

Lockers are available for an additional fee—perfect for keeping your belongings safe.

Please note: while there is no air conditioning, all rooms have ceiling fans and benefit from the cool ocean breeze.

A 1.7% card surcharge applies to all payments made by credit or debit card.

If you’re booking multiple beds in a shared room, we can’t guarantee all guests will be placed in the same dorm—though we’ll do our best!

groupInformation.terms: All group bookings will need to be reconfirmed by the property.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms: 50% deposit is required upon confirmation, an additional 25% is required one month prior to arrival and the balance is required two weeks prior to arrival. All deposits are non-refundable.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
Please be aware of the Mad Monkey Coogee Beach house rules;

All guests at Mad Monkey Coogee Beach must be over 18 years of age and understand that their stay is at their own risk. They understand & agree to abide by these rules with no exclusions. They understand that Mad Monkey’s staff’s priority is to ensure their safety, and agree that they will follow their directions at all times. 

1. Mad Monkey Coogee Beach cannot be responsible for any items lost or stolen during your stay. 
2. A security deposit of $50 per person is required either in cash or by credit card pre authorization by the organizer along with valid Government issued photo ID of each guest. 
3. Only paying hostel guests are allowed on the premises at all times. 
4. Mad Monkey Coogee Beach is not a party hostel, there is a no noise policy after 10pm. 
5. Alcohol is not allowed in any of the rooms and can only be consumed in the common area and must be consumed responsibly. Failure to do so will result in you being asked to leave without refund.    
6. Guests must take responsibility for all damages within Mad Monkey including the room & it's contents caused by the guest. Any damages will be charged to your account. 
7. Guests should understand that check out time is 11am (charges will apply if you check out after 11am). 
8. A bed will be assigned to you upon check in, if you swap beds without permission you will be charged for both beds. If you are unhappy with your bed allocation for any reason contact us immediately. 
9. Mad Monkey Coogee Beach is a non-smoking hostel. Guests should understand that smoking anywhere will result in a loss of the security deposit instantly and it will have to be repaid. 
10. Mad Monkey Coogee Beach has a no drug policy. If you are caught with or are taking illegal drugs you will be asked to leave immediately, and the authorities will be notified where applicable.
11. Guests should understand that the fire alarm call out charge is $1,800, which will be charged to the organiser should a member of the group be responsible for setting it off. 
12. Guests should understand that they risk eviction with no refund if they are unruly.
13. Mad Monkey Coogee Beach has a maximum stay policy of 14 consecutive days. 
14. I understand that I’m responsible for anyone I invite in/who comes to visit me/walks in with me. I understand that I will pay one nights rent for each of my friends if they are present in the hostel.
15. I authorise Mad Monkey Coogee Beach to publish photos of me on social media.
16. Mad Monkey Coogee Beach and Coogee Beach Hostel Pty Ltd takes no responsibility for injuries/death to the undersigned of this form.

You're good to go! Would you like help turning this into a formatted welcome PDF or web page content?

categories.category_description: This hostel has confirmed that they have implemented a sustainability strategy that will lead them to certification. They’ve committed to prioritising environmental, cultural and community best practices. They may also meet a Global Sustainable Tourism Council recognised standard.
